headline: Freshworks to Participate in the Oppenheimer 28th Annual Technology, Internet & Communications Conference
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Freshworks Inc. (NASDAQ: FRSH) today announced that Tyler Sloat, Chief Operating Officer and Chief Financial Officer, is scheduled to participate in a fireside chat at the Oppenheimer 28th Annual Technology, Internet & Communications Conference on August 11, 2025 at 9:25 a.m. Pacific Time (12:25 p.m. Eastern Time). An audio webcast replay will be accessible from the Freshworks investor relations website at https://ir.freshworks.com. About Fres
